scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf packages/*/node_modules; yarn run clean-yarn-cache
scripts.outdated: for P in $(ls packages); do echo '\n' === $P ===; cd "packages/$P/"; yarn outdated; cd ../..; done
scripts.create-test-app: yarn run clean-yarn-cache; rm -rf test-app; node packages/create-accurapp/index.js test-app --testing
